professional_summary: Experienced Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in RAC, Data Guard, performance tuning, and database management. Proficient in designing, managing, and securing databases with a focus on optimizing system performance and availability.

key_responsibilities: Performance tuning using AWR and EXPLAIN PLAN for database optimization.
Database management including schema creation and tablespace organization.
RAC and Data Guard implementation to enhance high availability and disaster recovery.
Database installation and schema creation on Linux platforms.
and Explain Plan to improve query efficiency.
Implementation of backup strategies using RMAN for scheduled and recovery operations.
